title: Dsgn&Analysis-Algorithms
description: Basic techniques of design and analysis of efficient algorithms for standard computational problems. NP-Completeness.  Credit not allowed for both CS 3510 and CS 3511.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CS 2050 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or CS 2051 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 2106 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and (CS 1332 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or MATH 3012 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3022 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
